section.title: Lot/Serial Comments
section.para: To associate Comments with Lot/Serial Items, select the "Lot/Serial Comments" option. The following screen will appear:
When associating Comments with Lot/Serial Items, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item you want to create a Lot/Serial Comment for.

The browse button located to the right of the field leads to a searchable Item list. The list includes all Items--as opposed to Lot/Serial Items only--because an Item may not currently be Lot/Serial Number controlled, but it may have been in the past.
Specify the Lot/Serial Number you want to create a Comment for.
Lot/Serial Numbers are created either when Lot/Serial Items are received into Inventory or when existing quantities are reassigned.
Display lists Comments associated with the specified Lot/Serial Number.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new Comment.
Highlight a Comment and then select this button to view the Comment.

section.para: To create a new Lot/Serial Comment, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

listitem.para: Specify one of the following Comment Types from the drop-down list: ChangeLog or General.

Comment Types are used to categorize Comments. Once you have specified a Comment Type, you may type your Comment in the main text area. The text area features word-wrapping and scroll-bar support for longer Comments.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a new Comment, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Comment and adds it to the list of Lot/Serial Comments.
